events.message: The applicant has submitted a personal loan application to cover medical expenses incurred recently.
The application was categorised under personal loan due to keywords indicating medical and personal purposes.
A loan officer has been assigned to this personal loan to ensure a smooth processing of the medical expense claim.
The loan officer completed an initial review, noting that the applicant's medical bills are well documented for further processing.
Additional proof of medical expenses and applicant's ID were requested to verify eligibility and identity accurately.
The applicant has submitted all requested documents, including medical receipts and proof of employment.
Credit check was completed with no significant negative reports; applicant maintains a satisfactory credit score.
Risk assessment indicates manageable risk levels with respect to applicant’s repayment history and current income.
A personal loan offer was presented to the applicant outlining interest rates, repayment schedule, and terms.
The applicant responded positively, agreeing to the terms and requesting prompt loan disbursal for medical bills.
The loan has been approved after verifying all documents and successfully completing the risk evaluation process.
Approved personal loan funds have been transferred to the applicant’s bank account for medical expense payment.
Follow-up call was made to check on applicant satisfaction and confirm receipt of funds for intended medical use.
The loan application process was successfully closed after ensuring all loan disbursal and follow-up requirements met.
